 2017-10272017-07-14PCH,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of IAN SCOTT of Chelsea, Quebec, to be a full-time member and Chairperson of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective September 5, 2017.
